covid.text:
We believe that our guests' safety and well-being is just as important as having a good time.

We are in daily contact with top officials in the Department of Health as well as the WHO. We analyse their recommendations constantly. As of today we take no actions towards postponing the party because we think it's still possible for Europe to turn the tide in the coming weeks.

We will post more information in this grey box here as soon as we know more.

homepage.intro1:
After many years we have decided to take official steps. Come celebrate with us in Kashubia!

We will share more details later - save the date until then!
homepage.intro2: The main celebration will happen on Saturday the 20th.
